scripts.build:development: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/reactStorybook/webpack.config.js --mode development
scripts.serve: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/reactStorybook/webpack.config.js --mode development --port 4200
scripts.serve:development: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/reactStorybook/webpack.config.js --mode development --port 4200
scripts.serve:production: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/reactStorybook/webpack.config.prod.js --mode production --port 4200 --no-hot
scripts.build-storybook: pnpm exec storybook build -c apps/reactStorybook/.storybook -o storybook/reactStorybook/dist
scripts.build-storybook:ci: pnpm exec storybook build -c apps/reactStorybook/.storybook -o storybook/reactStorybook/dist --quiet
